title: Prove your skills
description: Gain substantial experience by solving real-world problems and pit against others to come up with innovative solutions.

title: Learn from community
description: One can look and analyze the solutions submitted by the other Data Scientists in the community and learn from them.

title: Challenge yourself
description: There is nothing for you to lose by participating in a challenge. You can fail safe, learn about the entire experience and bounce back harder.

title: Earn recognition
description: You will stand out from the crowd if you do well in AI challenges, it will not only help you shine in the community but also earns rewards.
